title: Rising Shot: (Lesbian Romance)
description: Success, the love of her family, a caring boyfriend - Leslie Irvine lived an ideal life anyone would strive for. On the outside, Leslie is calm and collected. But her inner turmoil is revealed with the arrival of Jenna Watts, a bright new employee at her boyfriend’s company. She begins to question why her current relationship isn't as fervent as she had once imagined it to be while she trains under Jenna’s wing for a tennis match. Will Leslie find herself into playing with the other team?
author: S.B. Sheeran
